properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

providers.doc:
Manages mailing lists for Zimbra Collaboration Suite

Required binaries: `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmmailbox`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/ldapsearch`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmlocalconfig`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmprov`.  Default for `operatingsystem` == `Ubuntu`.
providers.name: zmprov

types.doc: Type to manage Zimbra mailing lists
types.name: zimbra_list

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

providers.doc:
Manage users for Zimbra Collaboration Suite

Required binaries: `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmmailbox`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/ldapsearch`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmlocalconfig`, `/opt/zimbra/bin/zmprov`.  Default for `operatingsystem` == `Ubuntu`.
providers.name: zmprov

author: Evelio Vila
summary: A Puppet module to manage the Zimbra CS
name: eveliovila-zimbra
